```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
class Graph {
private:
	int V;  // 图的顶点数
	vector<vector<int>> adj;  // 邻接矩阵
	vector<int> Degree;

public:
	Graph(int v, int e) {
		V = v;
		adj.resize(V, vector<int>(V, 0));  // 初始化邻接矩阵
		for (int i = 0; i < e; i++) {
			int a, b;
			cin >> a >> b;
			a -= 1;
			b -= 1;
			adj[a][b] = 1;
			adj[b][a] = 1;
		}
		Degree = vector<int>(v, 0);
		for (int i = 0; i < v; i++) {
			Degree[i] = degree(i);
		}
	}
	// 深度优先搜索
	void dfs(int v, vector<bool>& visited, int& count) {
		visited[v] = true;
		count++;
		for (int i = 0; i < V; i++) {
			if (adj[v][i] && !visited[i]) {
				dfs(i, visited, count);
			}
		}
	}
	bool isConnected() {
		vector<bool> visited(V, false);
		int count = 0;
		dfs(0, visited, count);
		return count == V;
	}
	// 计算顶点的度数
	int degree(int v) {
		int degree = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < V; i++) {
			if (adj[v][i]) {
				degree++;
			}
		}
		return degree;
	}
	bool isSemiEulerian() {
		if (!isConnected()) {
			return false;
		}
		if (Degree[0] % 2 == 0) {
			for (int i = 1; i < V; i++) {
				if (Degree[i] % 2 != 0) {
					return false;
				}
			}
			return true;
		}
		else {
			int oddDegreeCount = 0;
			for (int i = 1; i < V; i++) {
				if (degree(i) % 2 != 0) {
					oddDegreeCount++;
				}
			}

			return oddDegreeCount == 1;
		}
	}
};
int main() {
	int n, m;
	cin >> n >> m;
	Graph G(n, m);
	if (G.isSemiEulerian())cout << "YES";
	else cout << "NO";
}
```

### Code
```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <unordered_map>

using namespace std;

unordered_map<int, vector<int>> graph;
vector<bool> visited;

void DFS(int node) {
    visited[node] = true;
    for (int neighbor : graph[node]) {
        if (!visited[neighbor]) {
            DFS(neighbor);
        }
    }
}

bool hasEulerPath(int numPeaks, int anchorPeak) {
    visited.assign(numPeaks + 1, false);
    DFS(anchorPeak);

    // 检查连通性
    for (int i = 1; i <= numPeaks; ++i) {
        if (!visited[i]) {
            return false;
        }
    }

    // 检查节点度数
    int oddDegreeCount = 0;
    for (auto it = graph.begin(); it != graph.end(); ++it) {
        if (it->second.size() % 2 != 0) {
            oddDegreeCount++;
        }
    }

    // 起始和结束节点可以是奇数度数，其他节点必须是偶数度数
    return oddDegreeCount == 0 || oddDegreeCount == 2;
}

int main() {
    int numPeaks, numBridges;
    cin >> numPeaks >> numBridges;

    int anchorPeak = 1; // 带有传送锚点的山峰

    for (int i = 0; i < numBridges; ++i) {
        int peak1, peak2;
        cin >> peak1 >> peak2;
        graph[peak1].push_back(peak2);
        graph[peak2].push_back(peak1);
    }

    bool hasPath = hasEulerPath(numPeaks, anchorPeak);

    if (hasPath) {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
    } else {
        cout << "NO" << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}

```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <unordered_map>

using namespace std;

// 使用邻接表表示图
unordered_map<int, vector<int>> graph;
vector<bool> visited;

// DFS函数，用于检查欧拉路径是否存在
void DFS(int node) {
    visited[node] = true;

    // 遍历当前节点的邻居
    for (int neighbor : graph[node]) {
        if (!visited[neighbor]) {
            DFS(neighbor);
        }
    }
}

bool hasEulerPath(int node) {
    // 开始DFS
    DFS(node);

    // 检查所有节点是否都被访问到
    for (auto it = graph.begin(); it != graph.end(); ++it) {
        if (!visited[it->first]) {
            return false;
        }
    }

    return true;
}

int main() {
    int numPeaks, numBridges;
    cin >> numPeaks >> numBridges;

    // 标记含有传送锚点的山峰
    int anchorPeak;
    cin >> anchorPeak;

    // 构建邻接表表示的图
    for (int i = 0; i < numBridges; ++i) {
        int peak1, peak2;
        cin >> peak1 >> peak2;
        graph[peak1].push_back(peak2);
        graph[peak2].push_back(peak1);
    }

    // 初始化访问标记
    visited.assign(numPeaks + 1, false);

    // 检查欧拉路径是否存在，从传送锚点开始
    bool hasPath = hasEulerPath(anchorPeak);

    // 输出结果
    if (hasPath) {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
    } else {
        cout << "NO" << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
```

### Code
```cpp
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

bool isconnected(vector<vector<int>>graph) {
	vector<bool>visited(graph.size(), 0);
	queue<int> q;
	q.push(1);
	visited[1] = true;
	while (!q.empty()) {
		int cur = q.front();
		q.pop();
		for (auto it = ++graph[cur].begin(); it != graph[cur].end(); ++it) {
			if (!visited[*it]) {
				q.push(*it);
				visited[*it] = true;
			}
		}
	}
	for (int i = 1; i < graph.size(); i++)
		if (!visited[i])
			return false;
	return true;
}
void Eular(vector<vector<int>>graph) {
	if (!isconnected(graph)) {
		cout << "NO";
		return;
	}
	int sum = 0;
	for (int i = 2; i < graph.size(); i++) {
		if (graph[i][0] % 2)
			sum++;
		if (sum > 1) {
			cout << "NO";
			return;
		}
	}
	cout << "YES";
}
int main() {
	int n, m;
	cin >> n >> m;
	vector<vector<int>>graph(n + 1, vector<int>(1, 0));
	for (int t = 0; t < m; t++) {
		int a, b;
		cin >> a >> b;
		graph[a][0]++; graph[b][0]++;
		graph[a].push_back(b); graph[b].push_back(a);
	}
	Eular(graph);
	return 0;
}
```

```python
for i in range(n):
    graph[i + 1] = []
for j in range(m):
    u, v = map(int, input().split(" "))
    bridges.append((u, v))

def count_odd_degrees(graph):

    for node in graph:

            odd_count += 1

def has_eulerian_path(graph):
    odd_degree_nodes = count_odd_degrees(graph)
    if odd_degree_nodes == 0:
        return True
    elif odd_degree_nodes == 2:
        if len(graph[1]) % 2 == 0:
            return False
        else:
            return True
    else:
        return False


if has_eulerian_path(graph):
    print("YES")
else:
    print("NO")
```

```python
import networkx as nx


def is_eulerian_path(graph):
    if not nx.is_connected(graph):
        return False  # 图不连通，不可能有欧拉路径

    odd_degree_count = sum(1 for node in graph if graph.degree[node] % 2 != 0)
    return odd_degree_count == 0 or odd_degree_count == 2


bridges = []
n, m = map(int, input().split(" "))
for i in range(m):
    u, v = map(int, input().split(" "))

if is_eulerian_path(G):
    print("Yes")
else:
```

### Code
```python
from collections import defaultdict

def dfs(node, graph, visited):
    visited[node] = True
    for neighbor in graph[node]:
        if not visited[neighbor]:
            dfs(neighbor, graph, visited)
            
def is_semi_eulerian_path(n, m, start, bridges):
    graph = defaultdict(list)
    
    for u, v in bridges:
        graph[u].append(v)
        graph[v].append(u)
    
    # Check if the graph is connected
    visited = [False] * (n + 1)
    dfs(start, graph, visited)
    if not all(visited[1:]):
        return "NO"
    
    # Count the number of nodes with odd degree
    odd_degree_nodes = sum(len(graph[node]) % 2 != 0 for node in range(1, n + 1))
    
    # Check if there are exactly two nodes with odd degree
    if (odd_degree_nodes == 2 and start in graph and len(graph[start]) % 2 != 0) or odd_degree_nodes == 0:
        return "YES"
    else:
        return "NO"



def main():
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    bridges = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(m)]
    start = 1
    result = is_semi_eulerian_path(n, m, start, bridges)
    print(result)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

```

```python
from collections import defaultdict

def is_semi_eulerian_path(n, m, start, bridges):
    graph = defaultdict(list)
    
    for u, v in bridges:
        graph[u].append(v)
        graph[v].append(u)
    
    visited = [False] * (n + 1)
    dfs(start, graph, visited)
    if not all(visited[1:]):
        return "NO"
    
    odd_degree_nodes = sum(len(graph[node]) % 2 != 0 for node in range(1, n + 1))
    
    if odd_degree_nodes == 2 or (odd_degree_nodes == 0 and start in graph and len(graph[start]) % 2 != 0):
        return "YES"
    else:
        return "NO"

def dfs(node, graph, visited):
    visited[node] = True
    for neighbor in graph[node]:
        if not visited[neighbor]:
            dfs(neighbor, graph, visited)

def main():
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    bridges = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(m)]
    start = 1
    result = is_semi_eulerian_path(n, m, start, bridges)
    print(result)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```

### Code
```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

bool dfs(vector<vector<int>>& graph, map<pair<int, int>, bool>& visited, int current, int bridges, int visited_bridges) {
    if (visited_bridges == bridges) {
        return true;
    }

    for (int neighbor : graph[current]) {
        pair<int, int> bridge = make_pair(min(current, neighbor), max(current, neighbor));
        if (!visited[bridge]) {
            visited[bridge] = true;
            if (dfs(graph, visited, neighbor, bridges, visited_bridges + 1)) {
                return true;
            }
            return false;
            
        }
    }

    return false;
}

bool checkPathExists(int num_peaks, int num_bridges, vector<pair<int, int>>& bridges, map<pair<int, int>, bool>& visited) {
    vector<vector<int>> graph(num_peaks + 1);  // 加1确保数组足够大

    for (const auto& bridge : bridges) {
        graph[bridge.first].push_back(bridge.second);
        graph[bridge.second].push_back(bridge.first);
    }

    return dfs(graph, visited, 1, num_bridges, 0);  // 从顶点1开始
}

int main() {
    int num_peaks, num_bridges;
    cin >> num_peaks >> num_bridges;

    if (num_peaks < 3 || num_peaks>200 || num_bridges<2 || num_bridges>((num_peaks * (num_peaks - 1)) / 2))
    {
        return 0;
    }

    vector<pair<int, int>> bridges(num_bridges);

    map<pair<int, int>, bool> visited;

    for (int i = 0; i < num_bridges; i++) {
        cin >> bridges[i].first >> bridges[i].second;
        visited[make_pair(min(bridges[i].first, bridges[i].second), max(bridges[i].first, bridges[i].second))] = false;
    }

    if (checkPathExists(num_peaks, num_bridges, bridges, visited)) {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
    }
    else {
        cout << "NO" << endl;
    }

    return 0;
```
```cpp
}

    bool dfs(int start, unordered_set<int>& bridges, unordered_set<int>& peaks) {
        stack<int> s;
        unordered_set<int> visited;
        s.push(start);
        while (!s.empty()) {
            int current = s.top();
            s.pop();
            if (bridges.size() > 0 && peaks.count(current) > 0) {
                bridges.erase(current);
                if (bridges.empty()) {
                    return true;
                }
            }
            visited.insert(current);
            for (int neighbor : adjList[current]) {
                if (visited.count(neighbor) == 0) {
                    s.push(neighbor);
                }
            }
        }
        return false;
    }

    int vertices;
    unordered_map<int, vector<int>> adjList;
};

        graph.addEdge(connection.first, connection.second);
    }

    int startPeak = *peaksWithWaypoint.begin();
    unordered_set<int> bridges;
    for (int i = 1; i <= numBridges; ++i) {
        bridges.insert(i);
    }

    return graph.dfs(startPeak, bridges, peaksWithWaypoint) ? "YES" : "NO";
}

int main() {

}
```

### Code
```python
class Graph:
    def __init__(self, vertices):
        self.vertices = vertices
        self.adj_list = {v: [] for v in vertices}

    def add_edge(self, v1, v2):
        self.adj_list[v1].append(v2)
        self.adj_list[v2].append(v1)

def dfs(graph, start, visited, bridges, peaks):
    visited[start] = True
    bridges.remove(start)
    for neighbor in graph.adj_list[start]:
        if neighbor in bridges:
            bridges.remove(neighbor)
        if neighbor in peaks and len(bridges) == 0:
            return True
        if not visited[neighbor]:
            if dfs(graph, neighbor, visited, bridges, peaks):
                return True
    visited[start] = False
    bridges.append(start)
    return False

def check_path_existence(num_peaks, num_bridges, connections):
    peaks_with_waypoint = set(map(int, input().split()))
    graph = Graph(range(1, num_peaks + 1))
    for connection in connections:
        v1, v2 = map(int, connection.split())
        graph.add_edge(v1, v2)

    start_peak = peaks_with_waypoint.pop()
    visited = {v: False for v in graph.vertices}
    bridges = list(range(1, num_bridges + 1))

    return "路径存在" if dfs(graph, start_peak, visited, bridges, peaks_with_waypoint) else "路径不存在"

# 读取输入
num_peaks, num_bridges = map(int, input().split())
connections = [input() for _ in range(num_bridges)]

# 检查路径是否存在
result = check_path_existence(num_peaks, num_bridges, connections)
print(result)
```

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MAXSIZE 300
using namespace std;

//边节点
struct EdgeNode{
    int edge;
    EdgeNode *next;
};

struct VexNode
{
    int nodeNum;
    int Data;
    EdgeNode *first;
};

struct SevenBriged
{
    VexNode Feng[MAXSIZE];
    int n; // Number of Mountenr
    int m; //Number of Brige
};

void CreateGraph(SevenBriged &G) {
    int i, j, k;
    EdgeNode *p = NULL;
    EdgeNode *q = NULL;
    cin >> G.n >> G.m;
    for (k = 1; k <= G.n; k++) {
        G.Feng[k].nodeNum = k;
        G.Feng[k].first = NULL;
        G.Feng[k].Data = 0;
    }
    for (k = 0; k < G.m; k++) {
        cin >> i >> j;
        p = new EdgeNode;
        p->edge = j;
        p->next = G.Feng[i].first;
        G.Feng[i].first = p;
        q = new EdgeNode;
        q->edge = i;
        q->next = G.Feng[j].first;
        G.Feng[j].first = q;
    }
}

void Count(SevenBriged &G) {
    for (int i = 1; i <= G.n; i++) {
        EdgeNode *p = G.Feng[i].first;
        while (p != NULL) {
            G.Feng[i].Data++;
            p = p->next;
        }
    }
}

int main()
{
    SevenBriged G;
    bool Can = 0;
    int Nodeey = 0;
    CreateGraph(G);
    Count(G);
    for (int i = 1; i <= G.n; i++) {
        if (G.Feng[i].Data % 2 == 1) Nodeey++;
    }
    if (Nodeey < 2) Can = 1;
    else if (Nodeey == 2) {
        if (G.Feng[1].Data % 2 == 1) Can = 1;
    }
    if (Can) cout << "YES" << endl;
    else cout << "NO" << endl;
    //system("pause");
    return 0;
}

```

```python
def is_valid_path(graph, current_peak, visited, remaining_bridges):
    visited[current_peak] = True

    for neighbor in graph[current_peak]:
        if not visited[neighbor]:
            bridge = (current_peak, neighbor) if (current_peak, neighbor) in remaining_bridges else (neighbor, current_peak)
            remaining_bridges.discard(bridge)
            if is_valid_path(graph, neighbor, visited, remaining_bridges):
                return True
            remaining_bridges.add(bridge)

    visited[current_peak] = False
    return False

def has_valid_path(n, m, bridges):
    graph = {i: [] for i in range(1, n + 1)}
    for u, v in bridges:
        graph[u].append(v)
        graph[v].append(u)

    visited = [False] * (n + 1)
    remaining_bridges = set(map(tuple, bridges))

    return is_valid_path(graph, 1, visited, remaining_bridges)

# 例子：
n, m = map(int, input().split())

if has_valid_path(n, m, bridges):
    print("YES")
else:
```

```cpp
int all(int bridge[201][201], int n)
{
	for (int i = 0; i < n + 1; i++)
	{
		for (int j = 0; j < n + 1; j++)
		{
			if (bridge[i][j])
				return 0;
		}
	}
	return 1;

{
	int n, m;
	cin >> n >> m;
	int bridge[201][201] = { 0 };
	while (m--)
	{
		int u, v;
```

```python
        graph[v].append(u)

    visited = [False] * (n + 1)
    remaining_bridges = set(bridges)

    return is_valid_path(graph, 1, visited, remaining_bridges)

# Example usage:
n, m = map(int, input().split())
bridges = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(m)]

if has_valid_path(n, m, bridges):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>
using namespace std;


bool isConnected(vector<vector<int>>& matrix) {
    int n = matrix.size(); 
    if (n == 0) return true; 
    vector<bool> visited(n, false);
    queue<int> q;
    q.push(0); 
    visited[0] = true; 
    int count = 1;
    while (!q.empty()) { 
        int u = q.front(); 
        q.pop();
        for (int v = 0; v < n; v++) { 
            if (matrix[u][v] == 1 && !visited[v]) { 
                q.push(v); 
                visited[v] = true; 
                count++; 
            }
        }
    }
    return count == n; 
}

int main() {
        int n, m;
        cin >> n >> m;
        vector<vector<int>> A(n, vector<int>(n, 0));
        for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
            int v, u;
            cin >> v >> u;
            A[v - 1][u - 1] = 1;
            A[u - 1][v - 1] = 1;
        }
    bool result = isConnected(A);
    // 输出结果
    cout  << (result ? "YES" : "NO") << endl;
    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
}
```

### Code
```python
#判断图是否连通
def is_connected(n, edges):
    if not edges:
        return n <= 1  # 只有一个顶点或没有顶点时视为连通
    adj_list = {i: [] for i in range(1, n + 1)}
    for u, v in edges:
        adj_list[u].append(v)
        adj_list[v].append(u)
    visited = set()
    def dfs(v):
        visited.add(v)
        for neighbour in adj_list[v]:
            if neighbour not in visited:
                dfs(neighbour)
    dfs(1)  # 从第一个顶点开始深度优先搜索
    return len(visited) == n
def is_euler_path(n, m, edges):
    degree = {i: 0 for i in range(1, n + 1)}
    for u, v in edges:
        degree[u] += 1
        degree[v] += 1
    # 检查顶点1的度数是否为奇数
    if degree[1] % 2 == 0:
        return False
    # 计算除顶点1外度数为奇数的顶点数量
    odd_degree_count = sum(1 for i, degree in degree.items() if i != 1 and degree % 2 != 0)
    # 检查图是否连通并且除顶点1外最多只有一个顶点度数为奇数
    return is_connected(n, edges) and odd_degree_count <= 1
# 输入数据
n, m = map(int, input().split())
edges = []
for _ in range(m):
    u, v = map(int, input().split())
    edges.append((u, v))
# 判断是否有欧拉路径
result = "YES" if is_euler_path(n, m, edges) else "NO"
print(result)
```

### Code
```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	int n, m;
	cin >> n >> m;
	vector<int> dgrs(n + 1, 0);
	vector<vector<int>> mp(n + 1);
	for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
		int v1, v2;
		cin >> v1 >> v2;
		dgrs[v1]++, dgrs[v2]++;
		mp[v1].push_back(v2), mp[v2].push_back(v1);
	}
	int linked = 0;
	queue<int> q({ 1 });
	vector<bool> vis(n + 1);
	vis[1] = 1;
	while (!q.empty()) {
		int cur = q.front();
		q.pop();
		for (auto& nei : mp[cur]) {
			if (!vis[nei]) {
				q.push(nei);
				linked++;
				vis[nei] = 1;
			}
		}
	}
	if (linked != n) {
		cout << "NO" << endl;
		return 0;
	}
	int cnt = 0;
	for (int i = 2; i < n; i++) {
		cnt += dgrs[i] % 2;
	}
	if (cnt == 0 || cnt == 1) {
		cout << "YES" << endl;
	}
	else {
		cout << "NO" << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
```

### Code
```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	int n, m;
	cin >> n >> m;
	vector<vector<int>> mp(n + 1, { 0 });
	for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
		int v1, v2;
		cin >> v1 >> v2;
		mp[v1][0]++;
		mp[v1].push_back(v2);
		if (v1 != 1) {
			mp[v2][0]++;
			mp[v2].push_back(v1);
		}
	}
	int firk = mp[1].size();
	vector<vector<int>> links;
	vector<bool> vis(n + 1);
	for (int i = 1; i < firk; i++) {
		queue<int> q({ mp[1][i]});
		vector<int> link;
		while (!q.empty()) {
			int cur = q.front();
			q.pop();
			for (int i = mp[cur].size() - 1; i > 0; i--) {
				int tmp = mp[cur][i];
				if (!vis[tmp]) {
					q.push(tmp);
					link.push_back(tmp);
					vis[tmp] = 1;
				}
			}
		}
		links.push_back(link);
	}
	for (auto& link : links) {
		int cnt = 0;
		for (auto& ver : link) {
			if (mp[ver][0] % 2) {
				cnt++;
			}
		}
		if (cnt && cnt != 2) {
			cout << "NO" << endl;
			return 0;
		}
	}
	cout << "YES" << endl;
	return 0;
}
```

```c
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
        if (degree[i] % 2 == 1) {
            ++odd;
        }
    }
    if (degree[1] % 2 == 1 && odd == 1) {
        printf("YES\n");
    } else if (degree[1] % 2 == 0 && odd == 0) {
        printf("YES\n");
    } else {
        printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
```

```python
    x = 50  # 初始猜测值，可以根据实际情况调整

    while True:
        f_x = query(x)
        f_prime_x = (query(x + 1e-8) - f_x) / 1e-8  # 数值导数

        if abs(f_x - k) < 1e-5:

        elif f_x < k:
            x -= (f_x - k) / f_prime_x
        else:

    # 使用牛顿法查找根
    root = find_root(k)

    sys.stdout.flush()
```

```python
import sys

def sqrt_newton(n):
    x = n  # 选择初始值为 n，也可以选择其他值
    epsilon = 1e-4  # 设置迭代的精度

    while True:
        root = 0.5 * (x + n / x)  # 牛顿迭代公式
        if abs(root - x) < epsilon:  # 如果迭代精度满足要求，停止迭代
            break
        x = root  # 更新迭代值

    return root



def interpolation_search(target):
    result = sqrt_newton(target * 100)
    low, high = result - 1, result + 1
    max_iterations = 100
    for _ in range(max_iterations):
        mid = low + (target - low) * (high - low) / (1000 - low)  # 进行插值
        print(f'? {mid}')  # 发送查询请求至裁判程序
        sys.stdout.flush()
        response = float(input())  # 读取裁判程序的回应
        if abs(response - target) / target <= 1e-4:  # 如果回应接近给定的目标值
            print(f'! {mid}')  # 发送答案给裁判程序并结束程序
            return
        elif response < target:  # 如果回应小于给定的目标值
            low = mid + 1e-9
        else:  # 如果回应大于给定的目标值
            high = mid - 1e-9


# 输入导致原始海水泄漏的最小尺寸
k = float(input())

# 开始使用插值法搜索根
interpolation_search(k)
```

```python
    def has_cycle(current, parent):
        visited[current] = True
        for neighbor in graph_path[current]:
```

```python
    result = [str(graph_value[i]) for i in range(2, n + 1)]
    return f"Yes\n{' '.join(result)}"
```


```python
n, m = map(int, input().split())
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <unordered_map>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

const int MAX_N = 100005;

vector<int> adj[MAX_N];
int magatamaCounts[MAX_N];
bool visited[MAX_N];

bool dfs(int node, int count) {
    if (visited[node]) {
        return magatamaCounts[node] == count;
    }

    visited[node] = true;
    magatamaCounts[node] = count;

    for (int next : adj[node]) {
        if (!dfs(next, count + 1)) {
            return false;
        }
    }

    return true;
}

int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;

    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        adj[u].push_back(v);
        adj[v].push_back(u);
    }

    fill(magatamaCounts, magatamaCounts + MAX_N, -1);

    if (dfs(1, 1)) {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
            cout << magatamaCounts[i] << " ";
        }
        cout << endl;
    } else {
        cout << "NO" << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <unordered_map>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

const int MAX_N = 100005;

vector<int> adj[MAX_N];
int magatamaCounts[MAX_N];
bool visited[MAX_N];

bool dfs(int node, int count) {
    if (visited[node]) {
        return magatamaCounts[node] == count;
    }

    visited[node] = true;
    magatamaCounts[node] = count;

    for (int next : adj[node]) {
        if (!dfs(next, count + 1)) {
            return false;
        }
    }

    return true;
}

int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;

    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        adj[u].push_back(v);
        adj[v].push_back(u);
    }

    fill(magatamaCounts, magatamaCounts + MAX_N, -1);

    if (dfs(1, 1)) {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
            cout << magatamaCounts[i] << " ";
        }
        cout << endl;
    } else {
        cout << "NO" << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
    unordered_map<int, vector<int>> graph;

        int u = connection.first, v = connection.second;
        graph[u].push_back(v);

    visited[1] = true;

    while (!q.empty()) {

            if (!visited[neighbor]) {
                visited[neighbor] = true;

        }
    }
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <unordered_set>
#include <unordered_map>
#include <queue>

using namespace std;

bool checkPattern(const vector<vector<int>>& connections, vector<int>& counts) {
    unordered_map<int, int> magatama; // Mapping of lanterns and their counts
    unordered_set<int> seen;

    for (int i = 0; i < counts.size(); ++i) {
        magatama[i + 1] = counts[i]; // Mapping lanterns to their initial counts
    }

    queue<int> q;
    q.push(1); // Start with the lantern at seat 1

    while (!q.empty()) {
        int current = q.front();
        q.pop();

        seen.insert(current);

        for (int neighbor : connections[current]) {
            if (magatama[current] + 1 == magatama[neighbor]) {
                if (seen.find(neighbor) != seen.end()) {
                    return false; // The pattern is incorrect
                }
                q.push(neighbor);
            }
        }
    }

    return true;
}

int main() {
    int numLanterns, numConnections;
    cin >> numLanterns >> numConnections;

    vector<vector<int>> connections(numLanterns + 1); // connections[i] stores neighbors of lantern i
    for (int i = 0; i < numConnections; ++i) {
        int lantern1, lantern2;
        cin >> lantern1 >> lantern2;
        connections[lantern1].push_back(lantern2);
        connections[lantern2].push_back(lantern1);
    }

    vector<int> counts(numLanterns - 1); // Counts of magatama for lanterns other than seat 1
    for (int i = 0; i < numLanterns - 1; ++i) {
        counts[i] = 2; // Initial counts assumed to be 2
    }

    bool solutionExists = checkPattern(connections, counts);

    if (solutionExists) {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
        for (int count : counts) {
            cout << count << " ";
        }
        cout << endl;
    } else {
        cout << "NO" << endl;
    }

    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

bool solvable(vector<vector<int>>graph) {
	vector<bool>visited(graph.size(), 0);
	queue<int> q;
	q.push(1);
	visited[1] = true;
	while (!q.empty()) {
		int cur = q.front();
		q.pop();
		for (auto it = ++graph[cur].begin(); it != graph[cur].end(); ++it) {
			if (!visited[*it]) {
				q.push(*it);
				visited[*it] = true;
			}
		}
	}
	for (int i = 1; i < graph.size(); i++)
		if (!visited[i])
			return false;
	return true;
}
void OP(vector<vector<int>>graph, int m) {
	vector<int>jade(graph.size(), 0);
	jade[1] = 1;
	queue<int> q;
	for (auto it = graph[1].begin(); it != graph[1].end(); ++it) {
		q.push(*it);
		jade[*it] = 2;
	}
	int t;
	while (!q.empty()) {
		int cur = q.front();
		q.pop();
		t = jade[cur];
		for (auto it = graph[cur].begin(); it != graph[cur].end(); ++it) {
			if (jade[*it] == 0) {
				jade[*it] = t + 1;
				q.push(*it);
			}
			else if (jade[*it] != t - 1 && jade[*it] != t + 1) {
				cout << "NO\n";
				return;
			}
		}
	}
	vector<int>num(t + 1, 0);
	for (int i = 1; i < graph.size(); i++) 
		num[jade[i]]++;
	int sum = 0;
	for (int i = 1; i < t; i++)
		sum += num[i] * num[i + 1];
	if (m != sum) {
		cout << "NO\n";
		return;
	}
	cout << "YES\n";
	for (int i = 2; i < graph.size(); i++)
		cout << jade[i] << ' ';
}
int main() {
	int n, m;
	cin >> n >> m;
	vector<vector<int>>graph(n + 1);
	for (int t = 0; t < m; t++) {
		int a, b;
		cin >> a >> b;
		graph[a].push_back(b); graph[b].push_back(a);
	}
	OP(graph, m);
	return 0;
}
```

```python
import heapq

def solve_prayer_puzzle(n, m, connections):
    adj_list = [[] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    counts = [float('inf')] * (n + 1)
    counts[1] = 1
    
    for u, v in connections:
        adj_list[u].append((v, 1))
        adj_list[v].append((u, 1))

    heap = [(1, 1)]  # (distance, node)
    
    while heap:
        current_dist, current_node = heapq.heappop(heap)

        if current_dist > counts[current_node]:
            continue

        for neighbor, weight in adj_list[current_node]:
            if current_dist + weight < counts[neighbor]:
                counts[neighbor] = current_dist + weight
                heapq.heappush(heap, (counts[neighbor], neighbor))

    adj_subtract = [abs(counts[i] - counts[i - 1]) for i in range(1, n)]
    
    connected_set = {vertex for i in range(1, n + 1) for vertex, _ in adj_list[i] if counts[vertex] == counts[i] + 1 and vertex > i}

    if all(adj_subtract) and connected_set == set(range(2, n + 1)):
        print('YES')
        print(" ".join(map(str, counts[2:])))
    else:
        print('NO')

def main():
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    connections = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(m)]
    solve_prayer_puzzle(n, m, connections)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

```

```cpp
#include<iostream>
#include<queue>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

bool isBipartite(int n, int start, vector<int>& color, vector<vector<int>>& G) {
    int max_color = 1;
    int flag = 0;
    queue<int> q;
    q.push(start);
    color[start] = max_color;
    max_color++;
    while (!q.empty()) {
        int current = q.front();
        q.pop();

        for (int neighbor = 1; neighbor <= n; ++neighbor) {
            if (G[current][neighbor]) {
                if (color[neighbor] == color[current]) {
                    // 如果相邻顶点颜色相同，则图不是二部图
                    return false;
                }

                if (color[neighbor] == 0) {
                    // 如果相邻顶点未染色，则染上相反的颜色，并加入队列
                    color[neighbor] = max_color;
                    flag = 1;
                    q.push(neighbor);
                }
            }
        }
        if (flag == 1)
        {
            max_color++;
            flag = 0;
        }
    }
    return true;
}

// 判断整个图是否为二部图
bool isBipartiteGraph(int n,vector<int>& color, vector<vector<int>>& G) {
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        if (color[i] == 0 && !isBipartite(n, i,color,G)) {
            // 如果存在未染色的顶点并且从该顶点出发的子图不是二部图，则整个图也不是二部图
            return false;
        }
    }

    return true;
}
int main()
{
	int n, m;
	cin >> n >> m;
    vector<vector<int>> G(n+10, vector<int>(n+10, 0));
    vector<int> color(n+10, 0);
	for (int i = 0; i < m; i++)
	{
		int u, v;
		cin >> u >> v;
		G[u][v] = 1;
		G[v][u] = 1;
	}
    if (isBipartiteGraph(n,color,G))
    {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++)
            cout << color[i] << ' ';
    }
    else
        cout << "NO";
    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
}
```

```python
from collections import deque

def solve_prayer_puzzle(n, m, connections):
    adj_list = [[] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    counts = [0] * (n+1)
    counts[1] = 1
    
    for u, v in connections:
        adj_list[u].append(v)
    
    queue = deque([1])
    while queue:
        node = queue.popleft()
        for neighbor in adj_list[node]:
            if counts[neighbor] == 0:
                counts[neighbor] = counts[node] + 1
                queue.append(neighbor)
    
    adj_subtract = [abs(counts[i+1]-counts[i]) for i in range(n-1)]
    
    connected = set()
    for i in range(1, n+1):
        for j in adj_list[i]:
            if counts[j] == counts[i] + 1:
                connected.add((min(i, j), max(i, j)))
    
    if all(adj_subtract) and len(connected) == n-1:
        print('YES')
        print(" ".join(map(str, counts[2:n+1])))
    else:
        print('NO')

def main():
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    connections = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(m)]
    solve_prayer_puzzle(n, m, connections)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
```

```cpp
		sum = (sum * 10) + ch - '0';
	return sum;
}

int n, m;

int ans[100010], Q[100010], qfnt, qbck;

		printf("NO\n");
		return 0;
	}
	
	printf("YES\n");
	
	for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++)
		printf("%d ", ans[i]);
	printf("\n");
	return 0;
}
```

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MAXSIZE 99999
using namespace std;

//边节点
struct EdgeNode{
    int edge;
    EdgeNode *next;
};

struct VexNode
{
    int nodeNum;
    int Data;
    EdgeNode *first;
};

struct Torii
{
    VexNode Zhu[MAXSIZE];
    int n; // Number of Mountenr
    int m; //Number of Brige
};

void CreateGraph(Torii &G) {
    int i, j, k;
    EdgeNode *p = NULL;
    EdgeNode *q = NULL;
    cin >> G.n >> G.m;
    for (k = 1; k <= G.n; k++) {
        G.Zhu[k].nodeNum = k;
        G.Zhu[k].first = NULL;
        G.Zhu[k].Data = 0;
    }
    for (k = 0; k < G.m; k++) {
        cin >> i >> j;
        p = new EdgeNode;
        p->edge = j;
        p->next = G.Zhu[i].first;
        G.Zhu[i].first = p;
        q = new EdgeNode;
        q->edge = i;
        q->next = G.Zhu[j].first;
        G.Zhu[j].first = q;
    }
}

bool SetNum(Torii &G) {
    G.Zhu[1].Data = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= G.n; i++) {
        EdgeNode *p = G.Zhu[i].first;
        while (p != NULL) {
            if (G.Zhu[p->edge].Data == 0) G.Zhu[p->edge].Data = G.Zhu[i].Data + 1;
            if (G.Zhu[p->edge].Data == G.Zhu[i].Data) return 0;
            p = p->next;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

bool CanIf(Torii &G){
    int Can[MAXSIZE] = {0};
    for(int i = 1; i <= G.n; i++) Can[G.Zhu[i].Data]++;
    for(int i = 2; i <= G.n; i++) {
        EdgeNode *p = G.Zhu[i].first;
        int Count = 0;
        while (p != NULL) {
            Count++;
            p = p->next;
        }
        if (Count != Can[G.Zhu[i].Data - 1] + Can[G.Zhu[i].Data + 1]) return 0;        
    }    
    return 1;
}

int main()
{
    Torii G;
    int Can[MAXSIZE] = {0};
    CreateGraph(G);
    if (SetNum(G) && CanIf(G)) {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
        for (int i = 2; i <= G.n; i++) cout << G.Zhu[i].Data << " ";
    }
    else cout << "NO" << endl;
    system("pause");
    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MAXSIZE 100000
using namespace std;

//边节点
struct EdgeNode{
    int edge;
    EdgeNode *next;
};

struct VexNode
{
    int nodeNum;
    int Data;
    EdgeNode *first;
};

struct Torii
{
    VexNode Zhu[MAXSIZE];
    int n; // Number of Mountenr
    int m; //Number of Brige
};

void CreateGraph(Torii &G) {
    int i, j, k;
    EdgeNode *p = NULL;
    EdgeNode *q = NULL;
    cin >> G.n >> G.m;
    for (k = 1; k <= G.n; k++) {
        G.Zhu[k].nodeNum = k;
        G.Zhu[k].first = NULL;
        G.Zhu[k].Data = 0;
    }
    for (k = 0; k < G.m; k++) {
        cin >> i >> j;
        p = new EdgeNode;
        p->edge = j;
        p->next = G.Zhu[i].first;
        G.Zhu[i].first = p;
        q = new EdgeNode;
        q->edge = i;
        q->next = G.Zhu[j].first;
        G.Zhu[j].first = q;
    }
}

bool SetNum(Torii &G) {
    G.Zhu[1].Data = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= G.n; i++) {
        EdgeNode *p = G.Zhu[i].first;
        while (p != NULL) {
            if (G.Zhu[p->edge].Data == 0) G.Zhu[p->edge].Data = G.Zhu[i].Data + 1;
            if (G.Zhu[p->edge].Data == G.Zhu[i].Data) return 0;
            p = p->next;
        }
    }
    return 1;
}

bool CanIf(Torii &G){
    int Can[MAXSIZE] = {0};
    for(int i = 1; i <= G.n; i++) Can[G.Zhu[i].Data]++;
    for(int i = 2; i <= G.n; i++) {
        EdgeNode *p = G.Zhu[i].first;
        int Count = 0;
        while (p != NULL) {
            Count++;
            p = p->next;
        }
        if (Count != Can[G.Zhu[i].Data - 1] + Can[G.Zhu[i].Data + 1]) return 0;        
    }    
    return 1;
}

int main()
{
    Torii G;
    int Can[MAXSIZE] = {0};
    CreateGraph(G);
    if (SetNum(G) && CanIf(G)) {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
        for (int i = 2; i <= G.n; i++) cout << G.Zhu[i].Data << " ";
    }
    else cout << "NO" << endl;
    system("pause");
    return 0;
}
```

```python
from collections import deque,defaultdict
def solve_problem(n,m,connections):
#定义无向图
    graph = defaultdict(list)
    for u,v in connections:
        graph[u].append(v)
        graph[v].append(u)
#初始化magatama
    magatama = [0]*(n+1)
    magatama[1] = 1
#通过BFS分配magatama的数值
    queue = deque([1])
    while queue:
        node = queue.popleft()
        for neighbor in graph[node]:
            if magatama[neighbor] == 0:
                magatama[neighbor] = magatama[node]+1
                queue.append(neighbor)
#检测magatama数为n的灯笼是否与值n+1的灯笼全部相连
    magatama_count = [0]*(n+2)
    for count in magatama:
        magatama_count[count] +=1
    for u in range(1,n+1):
        next_level_count = 0
        for v in graph[u]:
            if magatama[v] == magatama[u]+1:
                next_level_count += 1
        if next_level_count != magatama_count[magatama[u]+1]:
            return "NO",[]
    return"YES",magatama[2:]
#输入数据
n,m = map(int,input().split())
connections = []
for _ in range(m):
    u,v = map(int,input().split())
    connections.append((u,v))
res,magatama = solve_problem(n,m,connections)
#输出结果
print(res)
if res =="YES":
    print(" ".join(map(str,magatama)))
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;

    int** graph = new int*[n + 1];
    int* edgeCounts = new int[n + 1]();

    // 读取边信息，同时计算边数并填充邻接表
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        graph[i] = new int[n + 1]; // 为每个顶点分配空间
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        graph[u][edgeCounts[u]++] = v;
        graph[v][edgeCounts[v]++] = u;
    }

    int* levels = new int[n + 1]();
    bool* visited = new bool[n + 1]();
    int* queue = new int[n + 1];
    int front = 0, rear = 0;

    // 初始化
    levels[1] = 1;
    visited[1] = true;
    queue[rear++] = 1;

    // BFS
    while (front != rear) {
        int current = queue[front++];
        for (int i = 0; i < edgeCounts[current]; ++i) {
            int adj = graph[current][i];
            if (!visited[adj]) {
                visited[adj] = true;
                levels[adj] = levels[current] + 1;
                queue[rear++] = adj;
            }
        }
    }

    // 检查所有顶点是否已访问
    bool solutionFound = true;
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
        if (!visited[i]) {
            solutionFound = false;
            break;
        }
    }

    // 输出结果
    if (solutionFound) {
        cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
            cout << levels[i] << " ";
        }
        cout << endl;
    } else {
        cout << "NO" << endl;
    }

    // 清理内存
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        delete[] graph[i];
    }
    delete[] graph;
    delete[] edgeCounts;
    delete[] levels;
    delete[] visited;
    delete[] queue;

    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;

    int** k = new int* [n + 1];
    int* edgeCounts = new int[n + 1]();

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        k[i] = new int[n + 1]; // 为每个顶点分配空间
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        k[u][edgeCounts[u]++] = v;
        k[v][edgeCounts[v]++] = u;
    }

    int* a = new int[n + 1]();
    a[1] = 1; // 将1号顶点设为第1级

    for (int level = 2; level <= n; ++level) {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            if (a[i] == level - 1) {
                for (int j = 0; j < edgeCounts[i]; ++j) {
                    int adj = k[i][j];
                    if (a[adj] == 0) {
                        a[adj] = level;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    bool solutionFound = true;
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
        if (a[i] == 0) { // 如果有顶点未被分级
            solutionFound = false;
            break;
        }
    }

    if (solutionFound) {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
            cout << a[i] << " ";
        }
        cout << endl;
    }
    else {
        cout << "NO" << endl;
    }

    // 清理内存
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        delete[] k[i];
    }
    delete[] k;
    delete[] edgeCounts;
    delete[] a;

    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    vector<vector<int>> graph(n);
    vector<int> magatama(n, -1);
    vector<set<int>> level_nodes(n);//用来判断magatama为n的时候是否连接上所有n+1的点

    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        u--; v--;
        graph[u].push_back(v);
        graph[v].push_back(u);
    }
    //经典BFS，一个深度magatama+1
    queue<int> q;
    magatama[0] = 1;
    level_nodes[0].insert(0);
    q.push(0);
    while (!q.empty()) {
        int node = q.front();
        q.pop();
        for (int neighbor : graph[node]) 
        {
            if (magatama[neighbor] == -1) 
            {
                magatama[neighbor] = magatama[node] + 1;
                level_nodes[magatama[neighbor]-1].insert(neighbor);
                q.push(neighbor);
            }
        }
    }
    //判断是否每个n的结点都连上了n+1的结点
    bool valid = true;
    for (int level = 0; level < n - 1; ++level)
    {
        for (int node : level_nodes[level])
        {
            set<int> next_level_nodes(level_nodes[level + 1].begin(), level_nodes[level + 1].end());
            for (int neighbor : graph[node]) {
                if(magatama[node]==magatama[neighbor])//如果两个点的magatama相同，那么这两个点之间的边是不合法的
                {
                    valid = false;
                    break;
                }
                next_level_nodes.erase(neighbor);
            }
            if (!next_level_nodes.empty()) {
                valid = false;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (!valid) break;
    }

    if (valid) {
        printf("YES\n");
        for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {
            printf("%d ", magatama[i]);
        }
        printf("\n");
    } else {
        printf("NO\n");
    }

    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    vector<vector<int>> graph(n);
    vector<int> magatama(n, -1);
    vector<set<int>> level_nodes(n);//用来判断magatama为n的时候是否连接上所有n+1的点

    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        u--; v--;
        graph[u].push_back(v);
        graph[v].push_back(u);
    }
    //经典BFS，一个深度magatama+1
    queue<int> q;
    magatama[0] = 1;
    level_nodes[0].insert(0);
    q.push(0);
    while (!q.empty()) {
        int node = q.front();
        q.pop();
        for (int neighbor : graph[node]) 
        {
            if (magatama[neighbor] == -1) 
            {
                magatama[neighbor] = magatama[node] + 1;
                level_nodes[magatama[neighbor]-1].insert(neighbor);
                q.push(neighbor);
            }
        }
    }
    //判断是否每个n的结点都连上了n+1的结点
    bool valid = true;
    for (int level = 0; level < n - 1; ++level)
    {
        for (int node : level_nodes[level])
        {
            set<int> next_level_nodes(level_nodes[level + 1].begin(), level_nodes[level + 1].end());
            for (int neighbor : graph[node])
            {
                next_level_nodes.erase(neighbor);
            }
            if (!next_level_nodes.empty())
            {
                valid = false;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (!valid) break;
    }

    if (valid) {
        printf("YES\n");
        for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i) {
            printf("%d ", magatama[i]);
        }
        printf("\n");
    } else {
        printf("NO\n");
    }

    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>
#include <unordered_set>
using namespace std;
bool check(const vector<vector<int>>& graph, const vector<int>& magatama, int layer) {
    for (int u = 0; u < graph.size(); ++u) 
    {
        if (magatama[u] != layer) continue;
        unordered_set<int> connectToNext;
        for (int v : graph[u]) 
        {
            if (magatama[v] == layer + 1) 
            {
                connectToNext.insert(v);
            }
        }
        for (int w = 0; w < graph.size(); ++w) 
        {
            if (magatama[w] == layer + 1 && connectToNext.find(w) == connectToNext.end()) 
            {
                return false;
            }
        }
    }
    return true;
}

int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    vector<vector<int>> graph(n);
    vector<int> magatama(n, -1);
    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) 
    {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        u--; v--;
        graph[u].push_back(v);
        graph[v].push_back(u);
    }
    queue<int> q;
    magatama[0] = 1;
    q.push(0);
    while (!q.empty()) 
    {
        int node = q.front();
        q.pop();
        for (int neighbor : graph[node]) 
        {
            if (magatama[neighbor] == -1) 
            {
                magatama[neighbor] = magatama[node] + 1;
                q.push(neighbor);
            }
        }
    }
    bool valid = true;
    for (int layer = 1; layer < n && valid; ++layer) 
    {
        if (!check(graph, magatama, layer)) 
        {
            valid = false;
            break;
        }
    }
    if (valid)
    {
        printf("YES\n");
        for (int i = 1; i < n; ++i)
        {
            cout << magatama[i] << " ";
        }
        printf("\n");
    } 
    else {
        printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
    while(!q.empty()){
        int num = q.size();
        for(int i = 0;i < num;i++){
            int frt = q.front();

            for(int j = 0;j < node[frt].to.size();j++){

}
```

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#include <queue>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

const int MAXN = 100005;
vector<int> adj[MAXN];
int magatama[MAXN];
bool visited[MAXN];
vector<int> num1(MAXN, 0);
vector<int> num2(MAXN, 0);

bool bfs(int n) {
    queue<int> q;
    q.push(1);
    magatama[1] = 1;
    visited[1] = true;

    while (!q.empty()) {
        int u = q.front();
        q.pop();

        for (int v : adj[u]) {
            if (!visited[v]) {
                visited[v] = true;
                magatama[v] = magatama[u] + 1;
                q.push(v);
            } else if (magatama[v] != magatama[u] + 1) {
                if (magatama[v] != magatama[u] - 1 &&

                    return false;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        num1[magatama[i]]++;
    }

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (auto j : adj[i]) {
            if (magatama[j] == magatama[i] + 1) {
                num2[i]++;
            }
        }
    }

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        if (num2[i] != num1[magatama[i] + 1]) {
            return false;
        }
    }

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
        if (!visited[i]) {
            return false;  // 如果有未连接的部分
        }
    }

    return true;
}

    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        adj[u].push_back(v);
        adj[v].push_back(u);
    }

    if (bfs(n)) {
        cout << "YES\n";
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) {
            cout << magatama[i] << " ";
        }
        cout << "\n";
    } else {
        cout << "NO\n";
    }

    return 0;
}
```

### Code
```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>
using namespace std;
vector<int> bfs(const vector<vector<int>>& graph, int startNode) {
    vector<int> distance(graph.size(), -1);
    queue<int> q;

    distance[startNode] = 1; // Start from magatama count 1
    q.push(startNode);

    while (!q.empty()) {
        int current = q.front();
        q.pop();

        for (int neighbor : graph[current]) {
            if (distance[neighbor] == -1) {
                distance[neighbor] = distance[current] + 1;
                q.push(neighbor);
            }
        }
    }

    return distance;
}
bool isValid(const vector<vector<int>>& graph, const vector<int>& distance) {
    for (int i = 0; i < graph.size(); i++) {
        for (int j : graph[i]) {
            if (abs(distance[i] - distance[j]) != 1) {
                return false;
            }
        }
    }
    return true;
}

int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;

    vector<vector<int>> graph(n);
    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        u--; v--;
        graph[u].push_back(v);
        graph[v].push_back(u);
    }
    vector<int> distance = bfs(graph, 0);

    if (isValid(graph, distance)) {
        cout << "YES\n";
        for (int i = 1; i < distance.size(); i++) {
            cout << distance[i] << " ";
        }
        cout << endl;
    } else {
        cout << "NO\n";
    }

    return 0;
}
```

```python
factorial_cache = {}  # 用于存储计算过的阶乘值
MOD = 998244353


def jiecheng(num: int):
    if num in factorial_cache:
        return factorial_cache[num]
    result = 1
    for i in range(2, num + 1):
        result *= i
        result %= MOD  # 在计算过程中取模运算
    factorial_cache[num] = result
    return result


def inverse_mod(n):
    return pow(n, MOD - 2, MOD)


def count_operations(k):
    total_combinations = 0
    for z in range(k // 2 + 1):
        for x in range(k - 2 * z + 1):
            for y in range(k + 1 - x - 2 * z):
                if x + y + 2 * z == k:  # 确保总次数等于 k
                    combinations = (jiecheng(k - z) / (
                            jiecheng(z) * inverse_mod(jiecheng(x) * jiecheng(y) % MOD))) % MOD
                    total_combinations += combinations

    return int(total_combinations)
```

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int MOD = 998244353;
typedef vector<vector<long long>> Matrix;
Matrix multiply(const Matrix& A, const Matrix& B) {
    int rows = A.size();
    int cols = B[0].size();
    int common = A[0].size();
    Matrix result(rows, vector<long long>(cols, 0));
    for (int i = 0; i < rows; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < cols; j++) {
            for (int k = 0; k < common; k++) {
                result[i][j] += (A[i][k] * B[k][j]) % MOD;
            }
        }
    }
    return result;
}

Matrix matrixPower(const Matrix& A, long long n) {
    Matrix result = { {1, 0}, {0, 1} }; 
    Matrix base = A;
    while (n > 0) {
        if (n % 2 == 1) {
            result = multiply(result, base);
        }
        base = multiply(base, base);
        n /= 2;
    }
    return result;
}

int main() {
    Matrix A = { {2, 1}, {1, 0} };
    long long n;
    cin >> n;
    Matrix result = matrixPower(A, n);
    cout << (result[0][1] * 2 + result[1][1]) % MOD;
    return 0;
}
```

### Code
```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>
#include <limits>

using namespace std;

const int INF = numeric_limits<int>::max();

struct Edge {
    int to, weight;
    bool isBlue;
};

int dijkstra(vector<vector<Edge>>& graph, int start, int end) {
    int n = graph.size();
    vector<int> dist(n, INF);
    vector<bool> visited(n, false);

    dist[start] = 0;
    priority_queue<pair<int, int>, vector<pair<int, int>>, greater<pair<int, int>>> pq;
    pq.push({0, start});

    while (!pq.empty()) {
        int u = pq.top().second;
        pq.pop();

        if (visited[u]) continue;
        visited[u] = true;

        for (const Edge& e : graph[u]) {
            int v = e.to;
            int w = e.weight;

            if (!e.isBlue) { // Red edge
                if (dist[v] > dist[u] + w) {
                    dist[v] = dist[u] + w;
                    pq.push({dist[v], v});
                }
            } else { // Blue edge
                if (dist[u] + w < dist[v] && dist[u] != INF && dist[v] != INF) {
                    dist[v] = dist[u] + w;
                    pq.push({dist[v], v});
                }
            }
        }
    }

    return dist[end] == INF ? -1 : dist[end];
}

int main() {
    int n, m, k;
    cin >> n >> m >> k;

    int numVertices = n + 2;
    vector<vector<Edge>> graph(numVertices);

    while (m--) {
        int u, v, w;
        cin >> u >> v >> w;
        graph[u].push_back({v, w, false});
        graph[v].push_back({u, w, false});
    }

    while (k--) {
        int u, v, w;
        cin >> u >> v >> w;
        graph[u].push_back({v, w, true});
        graph[v].push_back({u, w, true});
    }

    int shortestPath = dijkstra(graph, 1, 2);
    cout << shortestPath << endl;

    return 0;
}
```

```cpp
typedef long long LL;

struct 	Matrix{
	LL a[M][M];
	Matrix(){		//初始化 
		memset(a, 0, sizeof(a));
	}
	//可以转化，也可以不转，根据需求  
	void unit(){
		a[0][0] = a[1][1] = 1;
		a[0][1] = a[1][0] = 0;
	}
	//乘法的算符重载 
	Matrix operator*(const Matrix &B) const {
		Matrix ans;

			for(int j = 0; j < M; j++){
				for(int k = 0; k < M; k++){

	}

		Matrix A = *this;
		while(n){
			if(n & 1){
				ans = ans * A;
			}
			A = A * A;
			n >>= 1;
		}
		return ans;
	}
};
```

```python
def matrix_multiply(a, b, mod):
    # 矩阵相乘
    result = [[0, 0], [0, 0]]
    for i in range(2):
        for j in range(2):
            for k in range(2):
                result[i][j] = (result[i][j] + a[i][k] * b[k][j]) % mod
    return result

def matrix_power(matrix, n, mod):
    # 矩阵快速幂
    result = [[1, 0], [0, 1]]
    while n > 0:
        if n % 2 == 1:
            result = matrix_multiply(result, matrix, mod)
        matrix = matrix_multiply(matrix, matrix, mod)
        n //= 2
    return result

def count_dice_ways(k):
    mod = 998244353
    if k == 0:
        return 1
    elif k == 1:
        return 2

    transition_matrix = [[2, 1], [1, 0]]
    result_matrix = matrix_power(transition_matrix, k - 1, mod)
    return (2 * result_matrix[0][0] + result_matrix[0][1]) % mod

def main():
    k = int(input())
    print(count_dice_ways(k))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
```

```python
MOD = 998244353
#矩阵乘法
def matmul(a, b, mod=MOD):
    return [[sum(x * y % mod for x, y in zip(a_row, b_col)) % mod for b_col in zip(*b)] for a_row in a]
#矩阵快速幂
def matpow(mat, k, mod=MOD):
    result = [[1 if i == j else 0 for i in range(len(mat))] for j in range(len(mat))]
    while k > 0:
        if k % 2 == 1:
            result = matmul(result, mat, mod)
        mat = matmul(mat, mat, mod)
        k //= 2
    return result
#计算使用所有骰子的方法数
def count_ways(k):
    if k == 0:
        return 1
    if k == 1:
        return 2
    transition_matrix = [[0, 1], [1, 2]]
    result_matrix = matpow(transition_matrix, k - 1)
    return (result_matrix[1][0] * 1 + result_matrix[1][1] * 2) % MOD
#输入骰子数量
k = int(input())
#输出使用方法总数
print(count_ways(k))
```

```cpp
            res = matMul(res, a);
        }
        a = matMul(a, a);
        n >>= 1;
    }
    return res;
}

ll f(ll k) {

    Matrix initial = {{5}, {2}};

    if (k == 1) return 2;

    Matrix tmp = matPow(base, k - 2);

    ll res = (tmp[0][0] * initial[0][0] + tmp[0][1] * initial[1][0]) % mod;
    return res;
}

    cout.tie(NULL);
    ll k;
    cin >> k;
    cout << f(k) << endl;
    return 0;
}
```

```python
MOD = 998244353


def power(x, n):
    result = 1
    while n > 0:
        if n % 2 == 1:
            result = (result * x) % MOD
        x = (x * x) % MOD
        n //= 2
    return result


def mod_inverse(a):
    return power(a, MOD - 2)


def mod_fact(n):
    result = 1
    for i in range(2, n + 1):
        result = (result * i) % MOD
    return result


def comb(n, k):
    if k > n or k < 0:
        return 0
    return (mod_fact(n) * mod_inverse(mod_fact(k)) *
            mod_inverse(mod_fact(n - k))) % MOD


def count_ways(k):
    total_ways = 0
    for i in range(k // 2 + 1):
        burst_ways = comb(k - i, i)
        attack_skill_ways = power(2, k - 2 * i)
        total_ways += burst_ways * attack_skill_ways
        total_ways %= MOD
    return total_ways


# Example usage

print(count_ways(k))
```

```cpp
vector<vector<long long>> matrixMultiply(const vector<vector<long long>>& a, const vector<vector<long long>>& b) {
    int n = a.size();
    int m = a[0].size();
    int p = b[0].size();
    vector<vector<long long>> result(n, vector<long long>(p, 0));
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
        for (int j = 0; j < p; ++j) {
            for (int k = 0; k < m; ++k) {
                result[i][j] = (result[i][j] + a[i][k] * b[k][j]) % MOD;

        }

vector<vector<long long>> matrixPower(vector<vector<long long>> base, long long exponent) {
    int size = base.size();
    vector<vector<long long>> result(size, vector<long long>(size, 0));
    for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i) {
        result[i][i] = 1;
    }
    while (exponent > 0) {
        if (exponent % 2 == 1) {
            result = matrixMultiply(result, base);
        }
        base = matrixMultiply(base, base);
        exponent /= 2;
    }
    return result;

    vector<vector<long long>> resultMatrix = matrixPower(transitionMatrix, k - 1);
    return (2 * resultMatrix[0][0] + resultMatrix[1][0]) % MOD;
```

```python
import heapq


def shortest_path_with_blue_edge(graph, start, end):
    # Initialize distances, mark whether a blue edge has been used
    distances = {vertex: float('inf') for vertex in graph}
    distances[start] = 0
    used_blue = {vertex: False for vertex in graph}

    # Priority queue to store vertices and distances
    pq = [(0, start)]  # (distance, vertex)
    heapq.heapify(pq)

    while pq:
        curr_dist, curr_vertex = heapq.heappop(pq)

        if curr_vertex == end:
            return distances[end]  # Reached the end vertex

        for neighbor, edge_color, weight in graph[curr_vertex]:
            if edge_color == 'blue':
                if not used_blue[curr_vertex]:  # Check if blue edge already used
                    new_dist = curr_dist + weight
                    if new_dist < distances[neighbor]:
                        distances[neighbor] = new_dist
                        heapq.heappush(pq, (new_dist, neighbor))
                        used_blue[neighbor] = True
            else:  # Red edge
                new_dist = curr_dist + weight
                if new_dist < distances[neighbor]:
                    distances[neighbor] = new_dist
                    heapq.heappush(pq, (new_dist, neighbor))

    return float('inf')  # No path to the end vertex


n, m, k = map(int, input().split(" "))
graph = {node: [] for node in range(1, n + 3)}
for _ in range(m):
    i, j, w = map(int, input().split(" "))
    graph[i].append((j, 'red', w))
    graph[j].append((i, 'red', w))
for _ in range(k):
    i, j, w = map(int, input().split(" "))
    graph[i].append((j, 'blue', w))
    graph[j].append((i, 'blue', w))

result = shortest_path_with_blue_edge(graph, 1, 2)
if result != float('inf'):
    print(result)
else:
    print(-1)
```

```python
import heapq

count = 1


def dijkstra(graph, gragh_up, start):
    global count
    distances = {node: float('inf') for node in graph}  # 用字典存储节点到源节点的距离
    distances[start] = 0  # 源节点到自身的距离为 0
    pq = [(0, start)]  # 使用优先队列来存储节点和对应的距离
    visited = set()  # 记录已访问的节点

    while pq:
        current_distance, current_node = heapq.heappop(pq)  # 选择当前距离最小的节点
        if current_node in visited:
            continue
        visited.add(current_node)

        for neighbor, weight in graph[current_node].items():
                   
            distance = current_distance + weight
            if distance < distances[neighbor]:
                distances[neighbor] = distance
                heapq.heappush(pq, (distance, neighbor))  # 更新距离值并将节点加入优先队列

    return distances
```

```python
import heapq

def dijkstra(graph, start, end, blue_edges):
    heap = [(0, start, 0)]  # (cost, node, blue_edge_used)
    visited = set()

    while heap:
        cost, node, blue_edge_used = heapq.heappop(heap)

        if (node, blue_edge_used) in visited:
            continue

        visited.add((node, blue_edge_used))

        if node == end:
            return cost

        for neighbor, weight, is_blue in graph[node]:
            if is_blue and blue_edge_used == 0:
                new_cost = cost + weight
                heapq.heappush(heap, (new_cost, neighbor, 1))
            elif not is_blue:
                new_cost = cost + weight
                heapq.heappush(heap, (new_cost, neighbor, blue_edge_used))

    return -1  # No path found

def main():
    n, m, k = map(int, input().split())
    graph = {i: [] for i in range(1, n+3)}

    for _ in range(m):
        i, j, w = map(int, input().split())
        graph[i].append((j, w, False))
        graph[j].append((i, w, False))

    for _ in range(k):
        i, j, w = map(int, input().split())
        graph[i].append((j, w, True))
        graph[j].append((i, w, True))

    result = dijkstra(graph, 1, 2, k)
    print(result)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```

```python
import heapq
def shortest_path_with_climb(n, m, k, red_edges, blue_edges):
    graph = [[] for _ in range(n + 3)]
    # 添加红色边
    for i, j, w in red_edges:
        graph[i].append((j, w, False))  # False 表示非蓝色边
        graph[j].append((i, w, False))
    # 添加蓝色边
    for i, j, w in blue_edges:
        graph[i].append((j, w, True))  # True 表示蓝色边
        graph[j].append((i, w, True))
    # 通过优先队列实现 Dijkstra 算法
    pq = [(0, 1, False)]
    dist = {(1, False): 0}
    while pq:
        d, node, used_climb = heapq.heappop(pq)
        if node == 2:  # 到达终点
            return d
        for next_node, weight, is_blue in graph[node]:
            next_used_climb = used_climb or is_blue
            if (next_node, next_used_climb) not in dist or d + weight < dist[(next_node, next_used_climb)]:
                if not (is_blue and used_climb):
                    dist[(next_node, next_used_climb)] = d + weight
                    heapq.heappush(pq, (d + weight, next_node, next_used_climb))
    return -1
# 输入数据
n, m, k = map(int, input().split())
red_edges = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(m)]
blue_edges = [tuple(map(int, input().split())) for _ in range(k)]
# 打印结果
print(shortest_path_with_climb(n, m, k, red_edges, blue_edges))
```

```cpp
using namespace std;
```

```cpp
typedef pair<int, int> Pair;  // (距离，节点)
typedef vector<vector<Pair>> Graph;

vector<int> dijkstra(const Graph& graph, int src) {
    int n = graph.size();
    priority_queue<Pair, vector<Pair>, greater<Pair>> pq;
    vector<int> dist(n, INT_MAX);
    vector<bool> finalized(n, false);

    pq.push(make_pair(0, src));
    dist[src] = 0;

    while (!pq.empty()) {
        int u = pq.top().second;
```

```cpp
    bool isBlue;
};

        dist[i][0] = dist[i][1] = INF;
    }

    pq.emplace(0, start, false);
    while (!pq.empty())

        auto [d, u, usedBlue] = pq.top();
```

```cpp
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <queue>
#include <limits>
#include <tuple>
/*
两种状态，用了蓝边和没用蓝边，然后分别计算距离，用了就更新
*/
using namespace std;
const int MAXN = 200005;
const long long INF = numeric_limits<long long>::max();
struct Edge {
    int to;
    long long weight;
    bool isBlue;
};
vector<Edge> adj[MAXN];
long long dist[MAXN][2]; 
void dijkstra(int start) 
{
    for (int i = 0; i < MAXN; ++i) 
    {
        dist[i][0] = dist[i][1] = INF;
    }
    dist[start][0] = 0;
    priority_queue<tuple<long long, int, bool>, vector<tuple<long long, int, bool>>, greater<>> pq;
    pq.emplace(0, start, false);
    while (!pq.empty()) 
    {
        auto [d, u, usedBlue] = pq.top();
        pq.pop();
        if (d > dist[u][usedBlue]) continue;
        for (auto &[v, w, isBlue]: adj[u]) 
        {
            if (isBlue && usedBlue) continue;
            long long newDist = d + w;
            bool newUsedBlue = usedBlue || isBlue;
            if (newDist < dist[v][newUsedBlue]) 
            {
                dist[v][newUsedBlue] = newDist;
                pq.emplace(newDist, v, newUsedBlue);
            }
        }
    }
}
int main() {
    int n, m, k, u, v;
    long long w;
    cin >> n >> m >> k;
    for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
        cin >> u >> v >> w;
        adj[u].push_back({v, w, false});
        adj[v].push_back({u, w, false});
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < k; ++i) {
        cin >> u >> v >> w;
        adj[u].push_back({v, w, true});
        adj[v].push_back({u, w, true});
    }
    dijkstra(1);
    long long result = min(dist[2][0], dist[2][1]);
    cout << (result == INF ? -1 : result) << endl;
    return 0;
}
```
